title: Flyaway
description: Strange what chooses to flourish here. Which plants. Which stories. Bettina Scott lives a tidy, quiet life in Runagate, tending to her delicate mother and their well-kept garden after her father and brothers disappearâ€”until a note arrives that sends Bettina into the scrublands beyond, searching for answers about what really happened to this town, and to her family.For this is a land where superstitions hunt and folk tales dream - and power is there for the taking, for those willing to look.
author: Kathleen Jennings
